verses.name: John 6:18
verses.text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew.

verses.name: John 6:19
verses.text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and drawing nigh unto the ship: and they were afraid.

verses.name: John 6:20
verses.text: But he saith unto them, It is I; be not afraid.

verses.name: John 6:21
verses.text: Then they willingly received him into the ship: and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went.
